column5: Does anybody have a U.S. post office box that I could ship U.S. bought lures to. The supplier that Im dealing with will only ship to the U.S. Im wondering if there is a way around this. Any suggestions?
if anyone is going to the US border towns, could you stop and pickup a box full of crack cocaine  lures for me at my US mail address and bring it across for me..thanks...LOL

Have it shipped to the UPS store in Lewiston, NY. They will hold it for you for a small fee until you pick it up. How you get it back across the border is up to you. Some remove all packaging and put everything in a plano/tackle box. I recommend declaring everything and paying the duty/taxes if applicable.
I know Mike (Solo) has one and has offered up,but hes sunnying in the south right now.
Not sure which border crossing you use, but i have used this company many times.  Very easy access and very good to deal with.  Located in Niagara Falls, New York.  http://cbiusa.com/  Cheers  Craig
I use a shipping/recieving store...  Some companies won't ship to a po box...
I learned my lesson the hard way. I once offered to forward a package for someone who was a casual friend up North. For some reason he never got his Switchblade knife he ordered.  :wallbash:    Art
Uh Oh, your on to me !  Thanks for the replies guys. Im all set up now .

+1 for CBI.  I've used them 3 times now with NO PROBLEMS whatsoever.  Very easy, they take all sizes and weights.  Also they have a physical address and no PO box worries.  They are known by USPS, UPS and Fed Ex. and get multiple deliveries from each everyday.
This.  I've been using CBI for years now with zero issues.
You can ship all the lures you want to my house  Seriously though if you are from around London Ontario where my in-laws live I might be able to help you out sometime.
